caption.center: In the Matter of MICHAEL J. HYNDA, an attorney at law.

opinion.posture: On order to show cause why respondent should not be disciplined.
opinion.attorneys:
For the order: Mr. Frederick C. Vonhof.
For the respondent: Mr. Frederick B. Lacey.
opinion.opinion_text: Respondent suspended from the practice of law until the further order of the court. Opinion reported at 38 N.J. 94.
